item.title: add supportivekoala
item.description: http://supportivekoala.com/ - Allows you to autogenerate images by your input via templates. Free plan allows you to create up to 100 images per week.

item.title: Add degoo.com
item.description:
https://uploadcare.com/hub/developers/ - Uploadcare provides media pipeline with ultimate toolkit based on cutting-edge algorithms. All features are available for developers absolutely for free: File Uploading API and UI, Image CDN and Origin Services, Adaptive Delivery and Smart Compression. Limit free tier has 3000 uploads, 3 GB traffic and 3 GB storage.
https://degoo.com/) – AI based cloud storage with free up to 100 Gb, 5 devices, 500 Gb referral bonus (365 days account inactivity - AI based cloud storage with free up to 100 Gb, 5 devices, 500 Gb referral bonus (365 days account inactivity).

item.title: Adding icon.horse
item.description: https://icon.horse - – Get the highest resolution favicon for any website from our simple API.

item.title: Added Flagsmith
item.description: https://www.molasses.app - Release features with confidence; manage feature flags across web, mobile, and server side applications. Use our hosted API, deploy to your own private cloud, or run on-premise

item.title: update stackblitz description & add shortlink
item.description: https://node.new - Online/Cloud Code IDE to create, edit, & deploy fullstack apps. Support any popular NodeJs based frontend & backend frameworks. Shortlink to create new project: [https://node.new](https://node.new).

item.title: Added EmailOctopus
item.description: https://emailoctopus.com - Up to 2,500 subscribers and 10,000 emails per month free

item.title: Add GitDailies
item.description: https://gitdailies.com - Daily reports of your team's Commit and Pull Request activity on GitHub. Includes Push visualizer, peer recognition system, custom alert builder. Free tier has unlimited users, 3 repos, 3 alert configs.

item.title: Add Geoapify to Data Visualizations on maps
item.description: https://www.geoapify.com/ - Vector and raster map tiles, geocoding, places, routing, isolines APIs. 3000 free requests / day.
